recommended_degree: Manajemen Keuangan, Akuntansi, Administrasi Bisnis (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
A Finance, Accounting, and Procurement Intern will support daily administrative tasks such as processing invoices, organizing financial documents, updating spreadsheets, and assisting with basic bookkeeping. The intern will also help the procurement process by collecting price quotes, preparing purchase requests, and coordinating with vendors to complete required documents.

The ideal candidate is a fresh graduate from Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field. They should be detail-oriented, able to work with numbers, and comfortable using Excel or Google Sheets. Good communication skills, willingness to learn, and the ability to manage simple tasks independently are important for this role. Having a personal laptop to support work activities is required for this internship
